Room.Name: Tunnel Split
Room.ShortDescription: You have come to a three-way split in the tunnel.
Room.LongDescription: The main tunnel continues to the north, while two others run southwest and southeast. A light breeze comes from the southeast direction, and the floor rises at an upward cant in that direction. The tunnel going in the southwest direction is barely wide enough for you to turn sideways and squeeze through. The sound of a rusty hinge slowly opening comes from that direction.
